fields.name: - Welcome to the best place on planet Earth. Here at Aerotopia, you are given the following status effects:
fields.value:
- All cards you draw have an additional <:red:1106234051129507932> attached to their colors.
 - If @aero_spare13 is in your game, you may exchange one of your cards for a random card in his hand. (1 use)
 - If you are @aero_spare13, then you can be happy that you got your own card :D
 - Once played, the next card you draw will have the colors <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:white:1107514189574045726> attached to them

fields.name: - If this card were to be flipped, however... this card has the following effects:
fields.value:
- All cards you draw have an additional <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:white:1107514189574045726> + <:black:1106265022453268530> attached to their colors.
 - If @aero_spare13 is in your game, you may give one of your cards to him. (2 uses, 1 use a turn)
 - If you are @aero_spare13, you may passively gain 1 **Spell Slot** ðŸª„ every turn you take.
 - Once played, the next card you draw will have the <:wild:1106237191388143838> color attached to it.
